item.title: Clube Escola do Corpo – Website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Development of the website of Escola do Corpo (School of the Body, literally translated), from São José dos Campos, a non-profit organization that has been working for over 15 years promoting sports and physical therapy activities for children and adolescents

Read more ›

The post Clube Escola do Corpo – Website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Development of the website of Escola do Corpo (School of the Body, literally translated), from São José dos Campos, a non-profit organization that has been working for over 15 years promoting sports and physical therapy activities for children and adolescents in the city.

Versão Desktop

Versão Mobile

edcsjc_home-clube-escola-do-corpo-5
edcsjc_home-clube-escola-do-corpo-6
edcsjc_home-clube-escola-do-corpo-7
edcsjc_home-clube-escola-do-corpo-8
edcsjc_sao-jose-volei-fica-nas-quartas-de-final-do-campeonato-paulista-clube-escola-do-corpo
edcsjc_voleibol-masculino-equipe-adulta-clube-escola-do-corpo-3

Features:

  • Customized back-end in WordPress for better content management experience;
  • New content types division: News posts, Galleries, Events, etc., in different kinds of registration, which makes a more organized and assertive development. Each content has its own fields (texts, image, taxonomies).
  • Layout responsively adapted for broad TVs to smaller smartphones
  • The old image imports were optimized for better accessibility and lower page load
  • JavaScript, CSS and some of the HTML codes have been compressed to avoid most of loading interferences and requests

The post Clube Escola do Corpo – Website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: BrazSonic (BraSonic) website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
BraSonic: The Brazilian Hedgehog, it’s game for PC, made for the non-profit hobby project. This game is not only a parody of SEGA (TM) Sonic the Hedgehog, but also parody Brazil itself, with stereotypes, social criticism and familiar places in

Read more ›

The post BrazSonic (BraSonic) website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
BraSonic: The Brazilian Hedgehog, it’s game for PC, made for the non-profit hobby project.

This game is not only a parody of SEGA (TM) Sonic the Hedgehog, but also parody Brazil itself, with stereotypes, social criticism and familiar places in the country.

The first game in the series was released for PC in 2004, so BraSonic would have a sequel, which was canceled for personal and technical reasons.

Recently, I “ressurected” the project, with a completely new website and with lots of information and curiousities also to promote a new BraSonic game that is in development at an advanced stage.

Website features:

  • Customized back-end for better content management;
  • Responsive treatment for better user experience on many display sorts.
  • JavaScript, CSS, images and part of HTML outputs were concatenated and minimized for less obstrusive experience possible
  • Built-in textual content for greater detailing of the BraSonic series and engaging with social networks
  • Audiovisual content specially developed for BraSonic 2 to better tell the story of the game development and its versions
  • SEO treatment
  • Bilingual website (WIP)

 

The post BrazSonic (BraSonic) website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Vic Dress
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Functional and aesthetic maintenance performed on the Vic Dress company website. As the company has direct offline sales, the site was designed to be not only a “virtual showcase” but also to bring together reseller stores, build a more efficient

Read more ›

The post Vic Dress appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Functional and aesthetic maintenance performed on the Vic Dress company website.

As the company has direct offline sales, the site was designed to be not only a “virtual showcase” but also to bring together reseller stores, build a more efficient communication channel between products and bring greater reliability to the products on display.

The maintenance service on the Vic Dress website has redefined the architecture of the site’s data and templates based on these customer needs through changes to the site’s template code and also:

  • Cookies functionality implantation for products search
  • Creation of communication channels for products and establishments for scheduling visits and direct sales
  • Search filter settings, in particular, for colors and shapes of registered dresses
  • Pages of establishments that previously did not have layout and information
  • Optimization of performance and correction of technical Script errors
  • Responsive treatment for better navigation on different kinds of devices

Obs: Currently, as the website content is under development, that holds placeholder texts and images.

Before:

After::

The post Vic Dress appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Hyde Park – Website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Website developed for the Hyde Park venture, of the Tavares Filho group, in São José dos Campos, SP. The website provides information on the venture with photos, detailed plans, sustainability differentials and auditorium hall. FEATURES: Back-end in custom WordPress to

Read more ›

The post Hyde Park – Website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Website developed for the Hyde Park venture, of the Tavares Filho group, in São José dos Campos, SP. The website provides information on the venture with photos, detailed plans, sustainability differentials and auditorium hall.

FEATURES:

  • Back-end in custom WordPress to create a better content management experience;
  • Various types of page content with Custom Fields.
  • Layout responsively adapted from broad TVs to smaller smartphones.
  • JavaScript, CSS and some of the concatenated static HTMLs to interfere with page load as little as
  • possible

PROJECT MEMBERS:

  • NTZ Advertising: Intermediate, Layout, UI/UX;
  • Bruno Campestrini e Silva: Development, responsive adaptations, website migration;

The post Hyde Park – Website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: São José Vôlei – Website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Website rebuilding of the male volleyball team from São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil, which is maintained by the local city hall. The website has information about the team, games schedule, scores results, photo galleries of games and events,

Read more ›

The post São José Vôlei – Website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Website rebuilding of the male volleyball team from São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil, which is maintained by the local city hall.

The website has information about the team, games schedule, scores results, photo galleries of games and events, news and partners area for who is interested in investing on the team.

Features:

  • Customized back-end in WordPress for better content management experience;
  • New content types division: News posts, Galleries, Events, etc., in different kinds of registration, which makes a more organized and assertive development. Each content has its own fields (texts, image, taxonomies).
  • Layout responsively adapted for broad TVs to smaller smartphones
  • The old image imports were optimized for better accessibility and lower page load
  • JavaScript, CSS and some of the HTML codes have been compressed to avoid most of loading interferences and requests

The post São José Vôlei – Website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Excelency Guide – Intranet
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Intranet system made in WordPress, to be a manual of excellence for the client, a large company. This restricted portal was conceived and developed based on the company’s various IT teams: development, social networks, SEO and other, internal or outsourced,

Read more ›

The post Excelency Guide – Intranet appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Intranet system made in WordPress, to be a manual of excellence for the client, a large company.

This restricted portal was conceived and developed based on the company’s various IT teams: development, social networks, SEO and other, internal or outsourced, that needed a line of technical knowledge consultation and about the most standardized and semantic brand for which possible to obtain better results in their work.

The product itself, in addition to being an online reference material, had custom hierarchy rules for the registered user groups. For each user, in addition to its basic profile, portal content was loaded according to its role and brands that its team works on.

Subsequently, this work began to be used in other projects with similar demands.

Desktop

Mobile

Características:

  • Intranet made using WordPress;
  • User groups based on hierarchies of company functions and brands;
  • Navigation changes according to the group where the user belongs;
  • Post fields and custom categories;
  • Responsive design;
  • Bilingual;
  • Integration with BI system (Business Intelligence);

Note: for information security and copyright reasons, some information on this project was hidden.

The post Excelency Guide – Intranet appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Mempel Office Furniture – Website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Institutional website for office furniture store located in Sao José dos Campos, Sao Paulo. They demanded a new website, with more detailed product catalog and better ways to communicate to theirs prospects and alikes. Features: Category hierarchy for better organization

Read more ›

The post Mempel Office Furniture – Website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Institutional website for office furniture store located in Sao José dos Campos, Sao Paulo. They demanded a new website, with more detailed product catalog and better ways to communicate to theirs prospects and alikes.

Features:

  • Category hierarchy for better organization
  • Back-end customization for a better experience for updating its content
  • Responsive layout
  • Visual communication works (for home banners)
  • Photographic production
  • Image optimization for web

Project members:

  • Matheus Marques Vieira: UI/UX, information architecture, visual communication, photo production;
  • Bruno Campestrini e Silva: Q.A./Front-end/Back-end/Dev/Content formatting/Maintenance;

 

The post Mempel Office Furniture – Website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Master Sul – Website
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
Institutional website for Master Sul, a pest control company from São José dos Campos, São Paulo. The company demanded an modern website, which would bring more credibility about their services, on an informal way, as initial marketing strategy. On this scenario, the

Read more ›

The post Master Sul – Website appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
Institutional website for Master Sul, a pest control company from São José dos Campos, São Paulo.

The company demanded an modern website, which would bring more credibility about their services, on an informal way, as initial marketing strategy.

On this scenario, the website was built over the current brand, considering its form and colors, avoiding visual pollutions.

Regarding the content, the services was segregated in categories; some contact forms was used as prospecting ways to bring leads such as  new clients, job appliances, customer support; Some photo treatment was used on banners and company’s pages; and mascots were designed for representing some common plagues that they use deal with, in a cartoonish style bringing more informality and proximity to the viewer.

Features:

  • New forms of digital communication
  • Responsive navigation
  • Extra content for curiousities for services pages,
  • Contact forms for leads captation
  • Photo manipulation and treatment
  • Character design for the company’s ‘mascots’
  • Back-end’s customization for the company feed the website with new content

The post Master Sul – Website appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Ika Coelho – Blog
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
WordPress blog developed for Ika Coelho brand, which works with semi jewellery. The brand, also works with values as sofistication, personality and exclusivity. For a better communication hence its target public, the blog had to be more accessible, not only

Read more ›

The post Ika Coelho – Blog appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
WordPress blog developed for Ika Coelho brand, which works with semi jewellery. The brand, also works with values as sofistication, personality and exclusivity.

For a better communication hence its target public, the blog had to be more accessible, not only for users, but for a better experience of content management.

This job had indication of Árvore Advertising, which was responsible for the layout.

Features

  • Image optimizing for web
  • Instagram and twitter feeds
  • Interactive image gallery on posts
  • Custom theme based on the agency design.
  • SEOwork
  • Back-end customization for better management

Obs.: current theme offline

The post Ika Coelho – Blog appeared first on BCSilva.

item.title: Grupo Coneleste – Site

Institutional website for Grupo Coneleste, an insurance company located in Sao José dos Campos, Sao Paulo. They demanded a new and better internet communication toward their clients and prospects. Features: Responsive navigation Custom mailing themes for Mailchimp Visual communication on

item.content:encoded:
Institutional website for Grupo Coneleste, an insurance company located in Sao José dos Campos, Sao Paulo.

item.title: Social Media BR Layout
item.dc:creator: bcsilva
item.description:
WordPress website for Social Media BR, a website about SEO and Social Media, and owned by Alex Gonçalves. The layout was made over the old website, but it demanded lighter colors and shapes, and better organization. The reason I used

Read more ›

The post Social Media BR Layout appeared first on BCSilva.
item.content:encoded:
WordPress website for Social Media BR, a website about SEO and Social Media, and owned by Alex Gonçalves.

The layout was made over the old website, but it demanded lighter colors and shapes, and better organization. The reason I used lighter visuals was regarding the post contents which used to have lots of images, infographics, videos, ads, and etc.

An I.T. company called Zigotto had the role of dev for some specific widget components, like the calendar-shaped post archives.

As an WordPress website, I could improve its features like SEO, security, social media sharing.

Features:

  • Custom theme
  • Image optimization
  • Content optimization for SEO
  • Plugins maintenance for avoiding overusing and technical issues

Although, the website is offline.

The post Social Media BR Layout appeared first on BCSilva.
